jcr:root.jcr:description:
I’m so excited that the new season is almost here. If any of you remember my ordeal from last year (we don’t need to get into the details) then you will also remember that I need to buy new snowboard boots!
Does anyone out there have suggestions?
jcr:root.jcr:title: Time for new snowboard boots!
jcr:root.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

r2to-i_m_not_gonnaliei.jcr:description: I’m not gonna lie, I absolutely love the Kamloops. Not only are they super plush and comfy, they also keep my toes warm all day. That’s all you can ask for in a good boot.
r2to-i_m_not_gonnaliei.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5
